# Preface {.unnumbered}

This is a guide and reference book for the Evoland-HPC pipeline.
Evoland-HPC models future changes in the provision of ecosystem services under scenarios of climatic, socio-economic, land use change and alternative area-based conservation starategies. Evoland-HPC couples a [land use land cover change (LULCC) model for Switzerland](https://github.com/blenback/LULCC-CH)
[@black2023; @black], state-of-the-art
[species distribution modelling (N-SDM)](https://github.com/N-SDM/N-SDM) [@adde2023],
and ecosystem service models [@kuelling].
